name: Game Demo (Kravohi)
description:
Controls

press esc to quit the game at any point

Calvin Mode:

Left stick      / WASD        ->  move around

Right stick     / Arrow keys  ->  look around

A or Y button   / Enter       ->  interact / run toggle

B or X button   / Shift       ->  exit interaction

Ship Mode:

Left stick      / WASD        ->  yaw + pitch

L and R bumpers / Q and E     ->  roll

A or Y button   / Enter       ->  engine toggle

B or X button   / Shift       ->  brake

Start button    / Spacebar    ->  exit ship
